Added Price Spike Alarm, closes #47.
Now compiling with Android SDK 21.

Added error case when time frame is smaller or equal than update

Alarm status bar notification opens alarm settings instead of the alarm
list.
Fixes #57.

Alarm creation now outputs the correct and specific errors. Code
cleaning. All due to PriceChangeAlarm which now does the first fetch
from the exchange on the first run instead of doing it in the
constructor.

Offed alarms are now continuously updated while AlarmListActivity is
visible, closes #12.
Minor code cleaning and standardization of Log calls.
Added changeloglib to pom.

Now showing release notes in a dialog inside the app.
Rearranjed the about dialog and added mention to the libraries Boilr
uses.

Corrected alarm_alert layout which wasn't showing the buttons with phone
in horizontal rotation.
Updated translations' authorship information.
Updated cicardia's homepage.
Minor corrections in changelog translation.

Truncated change value in firing reason to 8 significant digits.
Improved localization of firing reason and time intervals, allowing a
more accurate translation.
Fixed bug which triggered a price change alarm instantly after pressing
'Keep monitoring'.
Added first public beta to changelog.
Added all libs in use to the about.
Added spike alert description to README.
Updated to libdynticker 0.5.0. Remove unnecessary excludes from pom.

Added event listener to open alarm settings when overflow icon is clicked.

Remove unsude code to handle clicks from listview.

Light is the now the default theme.
Hacked search icon to make it consistent between themes.

Added drag listener to reorder alarm on alarm list. Fixes #50.
Fixed AlarmLayout to format numbers.
Fixed GridView triggering clicks on the wrong cell.
